device_config.title: Device Configuration
device_config.description: The pin can be found via 'MENU button > Main Menu > System setting > Network > NetRemote PIN setup'

confirm.description: Do you want to set up {name}?

removed_yaml.title: The Frontier Silicon YAML configuration has been removed
removed_yaml.description:
Configuring Frontier Silicon using YAML has been removed.

Your existing YAML configuration is not used by Home Assistant.

Remove the YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.
